faqs.question: How do I create a new job?
faqs.answer: Go to the Jobs section in your dashboard and click 'Create New Job'. Fill in the customer name and vehicle number, then submit.

faqs.question: How do I process payment?
faqs.answer: After creating a job, you'll see a 'Process Payment' button. Click it to mark the job as paid and generate the approval code.

faqs.question: What is an approval code?
faqs.answer: An approval code is a unique identifier (format: ASLN-XXXX-XXXX) generated for each completed job. It's included in the receipt PDF.

faqs.question: How do I download a receipt?
faqs.answer: After processing payment, you can download the receipt PDF which includes all job details and the approval code with QR code.

faqs.question: How do I access training courses?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the LMS section from your dashboard. You'll see all available courses and can track your progress.

faqs.question: How do I get a certificate?
faqs.answer: Complete a course to 100% progress, then click the 'Download Certificate' button on the course detail page.

faqs.question: Can I post in the forum?
faqs.answer: Yes, vendors can create posts and reply to existing posts in the Forum section. All posts are visible to other vendors.

faqs.question: What if I need admin help?
faqs.answer: Use the chat widget to ask questions. If you need to escalate, click 'Escalate to Admin' to create a support ticket.

faqs.question: How do I update my profile?
faqs.answer: Go to your Profile page from the dashboard menu. You can update your name and other information there.

faqs.question: What should I do if my account is suspended?
faqs.answer: Contact an administrator through the support system. They will review your account status.
